about_the_game:
Crazy Cat is a simulation adventure game, the player plays a cat, shuttle in the jungle grass, adventure all the way! Green-based tone of the screen, allowing players to experience the fun back to nature!
   The game is simple, mainly with the A, D key to control the cat move around, W, K key control jump, but the content is rich. Multiple routes, players need to choose, if the wrong route, adventure will be very difficult!
   Players should learn to avoid obstacles, choose the best route to adventure!
   This game, a very test IQ, can exercise the brain's alertness and responsiveness!
detailed_description:
Crazy Cat is a simulation adventure game, the player plays a cat, shuttle in the jungle grass, adventure all the way! Green-based tone of the screen, allowing players to experience the fun back to nature!
   The game is simple, mainly with the A, D key to control the cat move around, W, K key control jump, but the content is rich. Multiple routes, players need to choose, if the wrong route, adventure will be very difficult!
   Players should learn to avoid obstacles, choose the best route to adventure!
   This game, a very test IQ, can exercise the brain's alertness and responsiveness!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The keyboard and mouse are needed

name: Crazy Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual core processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Works fine on integrated laptop graphics like Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The keyboard and mouse are needed

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Arabic, Korean
